IndexPage.title: next-intl example
IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.

missionoverlay.message: Our mission and vision for developing a car simulation using green energy and recycled materials is to create a sustainable future for our planet.
missionoverlay.message2: By using recycled materials in the development of the car simulation, we hope to reduce waste and promote the use of sustainable materials. Our goal is to inspire others to prioritize sustainability in their daily lives and to raise awareness of the importance of reducing our environmental impact. We envision a future where green energy and sustainable materials are the standard in the automotive industry.​

sustainable.title: Sustainable development
sustainable.message: Developing a car simulation using green energy and recycled materials is to create a sustainable future for our planet

awareness.title: Raising awareness​
awareness.message: Inspire others to prioritize sustainability and to raise awareness of the importance of reducing our environmental impact

recycling.title: Recycling​
recycling.message: using recycled materials to reduce waste and promote recycling of  useful material

reducing.title: Reducing pollution​
reducing.message: Using recycled materials to develop car simulation, we hope to reduce waste and pollution

descriptionoverlay.title: What we do
descriptionoverlay.subtitle: Our holistic approach
descriptionoverlay.description: Our approach to developing a car simulation using green energy and recycled materials is to prioritize sustainability and environmental consciousness throughout the entire process. We start by sourcing recycled materials for the construction of the car simulation, ensuring that the materials we use have minimal impact on the environment. We then incorporate green energy sources to reduce our carbon footprint and promote renewable energy. Our team works to optimize the energy efficiency of the car simulation to further minimize its impact on the environment. We aim to demonstrate that sustainable practices can be integrated into everyday technologies such as cars, and that they can be both practical and environmentally responsible.

newsletter.message: Sign up to our newsletter and get our latest news and updates.

TechnologyPage.title: Technology
TechnologyPage.subtitle: Sustainable mechanics
TechnologyPage.speaker: NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC
TechnologyPage.message: "Similarly, the end of a car’s life doesn’t mark the end of its environmental impact. Plastics, toxic battery acids, and other products may stay in the environment."

pollutionoverlay.title: Production and Destruction
pollutionoverlay.subtitle: Environmental impacts of scrap cars
pollutionoverlay.description:
Scrap cars can also cause pollution and environmental problems. Like wrecked cars, scrap cars can leak fluids such as oil, transmission fluid, and coolant, which can contaminate soil, groundwater, and surface water, and have harmful effects on plants, animals, and humans.

 When scrap cars are crushed or shredded for recycling, they can release particulate matter and other pollutants into the air. This is because the process of crushing and shredding can generate dust and other particles which can be harmful to human health and the environment. The production of new cars and the disposal of old ones can also contribute to pollution, as these processes require energy and resources and can release pollutants such as greenhouse gases and toxic chemicals.

upcyclingoverlay.title: Inspiring Recycling
upcyclingoverlay.content: The Recycling Fund provide the Enterprise Support Programme (ESP) to undertake projects which can assist the local recycling industry in general or in specific sectors in enhancing their operational standards and productivity.With the support from the funding, Aerosim start to think about upcycling scrap and useless car.

descriptionoverlay.title: Reverse Engineering
descriptionoverlay.description: We have also incorporated innovative technologies like the MQTT control unit into our system. This cutting-edge technology provides internet connectivity, enabling wireless real-time remote control and data logging. With the MQTT control unit, users can easily monitor and adjust their simulation setup from anywhere, making it more convenient and user-friendly. This feature has enhanced the overall experience of our car simulator, making it more accessible to a wider audience. By incorporating the MQTT control unit, we have also aligned ourselves with the principles of ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance), as it enables us to create a more sustainable and efficient system.
descriptionoverlay.message: Her second life, Your second ride.

descriptionoverlay.title: Car as Real
descriptionoverlay.subtitle: Simulation as Real
descriptionoverlay.description: Introducing the Car Simulator (Car Sim), a groundbreaking product that provides an immersive and realistic driving experience. The Car Sim removes the front panel and dashboard from a real car and combines them with game racing components, such as a foot brake, to create an authentic driving experience.

gameovelay.title: Learn Driving
gameovelay.description:
The gaming scene is displayed on a screen, while the dashboard provides real-time feedback on key driving statistics such as speed, RPM, and fuel level. This feedback provides a highly realistic experience for learners, allowing them to train their driving skills without the need to operate a real vehicle. Learners can track their progress and make adjustments to their driving technique as needed, making the Car Simulator (Car Sim) an ideal tool for learners of all levels.
The Car Sim is an essential tool for driving schools, professional drivers, and anyone looking to improve their driving skills. Its realistic design and advanced integration with car simulation software make it the ultimate driving companion for learners of all levels.

AboutusPage.title: About Us
AboutusPage.subtitle: End-to-End Aviation Training & Education Tech Solutions
AboutusPage.description: Aerosim is an Aviation Technology and Solutions company that uses synthetic aviation technology to provide services in the education and aviation sectors. In the education sector, we offers flight simulation devices and training aids at an accessible price for schools, along with certified curriculum and training courses.

educationovelay.title: We education aivation talents
educationovelay.content: In the aviation sector, we provides courses and training using their flight simulation devices and self-developed curriculum for young aviation enthusiasts. Additionally, Aerosim offers consultancy and commercial operation license application services for unmanned aircraft systems (UAS) operations, as well as UAS safety training for schools. After only one year of product launch, Aerosim has been serve around 10% of the school population.

NewsPage.title: News & Insight
NewsPage.subtitle: Explore our story
NewsPage.description:
The routing is internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /about in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is prefixed with the locale (/de/about).
